Package ca.ucalgary.edu.ensf380

Class SubwayLine

java.lang.Object
ca.ucalgary.edu.ensf380.SubwayLine
public class SubwayLine extends Object
Represents a subway line with its stations and trains.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    SubwayLine(String lineName)
    Constructs a SubwayLine object with the given line name and no stations or trains.
    SubwayLine(String lineName, List<TrainStation> stations)
    Constructs a SubwayLine object with the given line name and stations.
    SubwayLine(String lineName, List<TrainStation> stations, List<Train> trains)
    Constructs a SubwayLine object with the given line name, stations, and trains.
